document_api_meta.title: Seller Search Creator on Marketplace
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API is used by Sellers to search for Creators in the Creator Marketplace. Sellers can search based on filters such as GMV, keywords, and Creator follower demographics. All the data returned is for the last 30 days.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: Pagination offset determines where you begin to search for. It's empty when raise your first request

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc: The value of "page_size" must be 12 or 20

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: search_key
request_body_param.desc:
Caching search results improves api performance and ensures stable request results.
You don't need to pass a value on the first call. 
For the second call, please pass the value returned in the response of the first call.

request_body_param.name: keyword
request_body_param.desc: Searching creators by keyword, matching based on TikTok Username and Nickname.

request_body_param.name: ^age_ranges
request_body_param.desc:
Follower age filtering options, which are range intervals, include: 
AGE_RANGE_18_24: "18-24", 
AGE_RANGE_25_34: "25-34", 
AGE_RANGE_35_44: "35-44", 
AGE_RANGE_45_54: "45-54", 
AGE_RANGE_55_AND_ABOVE: "55+"

request_body_param.name: ^^count_ge
request_body_param.desc:
The minimum value of follower count. 
The value passed in must be greater than or equal to 0

request_body_param.name: ^^count_le
request_body_param.desc:
The maximum value of follower count. 
- Generally, a value greater than or equal to 0 needs to be passed. If a value less than 0 is passed, it means that the field will not be filtered.

request_body_param.name: ^gender_distribution
request_body_param.desc: Filtering creators by follower gender which includes: "male", "female"

request_body_param.name: ^^percentage_ge
request_body_param.desc:
Greater than or equal to a certain percentage, scaled up by 10,000 times. 
For example, 6000 stands for 0.6 or 60%

request_body_param.name: gmv_ranges
request_body_param.desc:
Filtering by GMV range intervals which include: 
GMV_RANGE_0_100: "0-100", 
GMV_RANGE_100_1000: "100-1000", 
GMV_RANGE_1000_10000: "1000-10000", 
GMV_RANGE_10000_AND_ABOVE: "10000+"
For example: 
- If GMV_RANGE_0_100 is passed, it means filtering the creator data that is greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 100.
- If GMV_RANGE_0_100 and GMV_RANGE_100_1000 are passed, it means to filter the creator data that is greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 1000.

request_body_param.name: units_sold_ranges
request_body_param.desc:
Filtering by sales volume range intervals which include: 
UNITS_SOLD_RANGE_0_10: "0-10", 
UNITS_SOLD_RANGE_10_100: "10-100", 
UNITS_SOLD_RANGE_100_1000: "100-1000", 
UNITS_SOLD_RANGE_1000_AND_ABOVE: "1000+"
For example: 
- If UNITS_SOLD_RANGE_0_10 is passed, it means filtering the creator data that is greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 10.
- If UNITS_SOLD_RANGE_0_10 and UNITS_SOLD_RANGE_10_100 are passed, it means to filter the creator data that is greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 100.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: Next page token

response_param.name: ^search_key
response_param.desc: Caching search results improves api performance and ensures stable request results

response_param.name: ^creators
response_param.desc: Creator's basic information

response_param.name: ^^username
response_param.desc: Creator's TikTok Username

response_param.name: ^^nickname
response_param.desc: Creator's TikTok Nickname

response_param.name: ^^avatar
response_param.desc: Creator's profile picture

response_param.name: ^^^url
response_param.desc: URL of creator's avatar picture

response_param.name: ^^selection_region
response_param.desc: Regions where the creator operates and promotes products

response_param.name: ^^category_ids
response_param.desc: It indicates the main product categories when the creator posts products.

response_param.name: ^^avg_ec_live_uv
response_param.desc: Average UV for creator's e-commerce live streams

response_param.name: ^^avg_ec_video_view_count
response_param.desc: Average views for creator's e-commerce videos

response_param.name: ^^follower_count
response_param.desc: Follower count

response_param.name: ^^gmv
response_param.desc:
Creator GMV-related information
If the creator does not authorize sharing precise data, this will be omitted.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: Currency symbol

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: GMV value

response_param.name: ^^live_gmv
response_param.desc:
Live stream GMV
If the creator does not authorize sharing precise data, this will be omitted.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: Currency symbol

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: Live stream GMV value

response_param.name: ^^video_gmv
response_param.desc:
Video GMV-related information
If the creator does not authorize sharing precise data, this will be omitted.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: Currency symbol

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: Video GMV value

response_param.name: ^^gmv_range
response_param.desc:
GMV range.
Applicable if the target market is the US and the creator does not authorize sharing precise data.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: Currency symbol

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The minimum value of GMV range

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The maximum value of GMV range

response_param.name: ^^^formatted_range
response_param.desc: The formatted range of GMV values associated with this creator.

response_param.name: ^^units_sold_range
response_param.desc: The range of minimum number of units sold to maximum number of units sold over the lifetime of the creator account. Note that this property is included if the target market is US only. Note that if the creator has not given permission for precise data sharing, these properties will not be present.

response_param.name: ^^^minimum_amount
response_param.desc: The minimum value of sales volume range

response_param.name: ^^^maximum_amount
response_param.desc: The maximum value of sales volume range

response_param.name: ^^^formatted_range
response_param.desc: The formatted range of minimum number of units sold to maximum number of units sold over the lifetime of the creator account.

response_param.name: ^^top_follower_demographics
response_param.desc: Top follower information of the creator

response_param.name: ^^^age_ranges
response_param.desc:
Return the top 3 age ranges of the followers. Ranges are :
AGE_RANGE_18_24: "18-24", 
AGE_RANGE_25_34: "25-34", 
AGE_RANGE_35_44: "35-44", 
AGE_RANGE_45_54: "45-54", 
AGE_RANGE_55_AND_ABOVE: "55+"

response_param.name: ^^^major_gender
response_param.desc: Major gender of the followers

response_param.name: ^^^^gender
response_param.desc: Top follower gender category of the creator, "MALE" or "FEMALE"

response_param.name: ^^^^percentage
response_param.desc:
Percentage of top follower gender, scaled up by 10,000 times. 
For example, 6524 stands for 0.6524 or 65.24%. You can then infer that the opposite gender would be 0.3476 or 34.76%.

response_param.name: ^^creator_open_id
response_param.desc: Creator Open ID. [More details](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/3obfokj6)

error_code_list.msg: The query quota has been reached (10000 request per day). Please try again tomorrow.
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplacePost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.AffiliateSellerV202508API.AffiliateSeller202508MarketplaceCreatorsSearchPost(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.PageToken("b2Zmc2V0PTAK")
    request = request.PageSize(12)
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBody := affiliateSeller_v202508.NewAffiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBody()
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBody.SetSearchKey("2E+0EcXoSk2HWdEWh2nITfkBRMbwuug0mt9s3fWgV0k=")
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBody.SetKeyword("JefreeStar")
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographics := affiliateSeller_v202508.NewAffiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographics()
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsAgeRangesList := []string{"AGE_RANGE_18_24","AGE_RANGE_35_44"}
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographics.SetAgeRanges(affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsAgeRangesList)
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsCountRange := affiliateSeller_v202508.NewAffiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsCountRange()
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsCountRange.SetCountGe(1000)
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsCountRange.SetCountLe(10000)
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographics.SetCountRange(*affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsCountRange)
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsGenderDistribution := affiliateSeller_v202508.NewAffiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsGenderDistribution()
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsGenderDistribution.SetGender("MALE")
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsGenderDistribution.SetPercentageGe(6000)
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographics.SetGenderDistribution(*affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographicsGenderDistribution)
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBody.SetFollowerDemographics(*affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyFollowerDemographics)
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyGmvRangesList := []string{"GMV_RANGE_0_100","GMV_RANGE_100_1000"}
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBody.SetGmvRanges(affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyGmvRangesList)
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyUnitsSoldRangesList := []string{"UNITS_SOLD_RANGE_0_10","UNITS_SOLD_RANGE_100_1000","UNITS_SOLD_RANGE_OVER_1000"}
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBody.SetUnitsSoldRanges(affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBodyUnitsSoldRangesList)
    request = request.AffiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBody(*affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchCreatorOnMarketplaceRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

sample_code.label: Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access the Creator Marketplace to find suitable Creators based on filters such as Creator category, ecomerce content performance, affiliate sales performance, and audience demographics.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access the Creator Marketplace on your behalf to find suitable Creators based on filters such as Creator category, ecommerce content performance, affiliate sales performance, and audience demographics.
